channel.title: Golangs on Ding Jianhui 的个人博客 - 学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in Golangs on Ding Jianhui 的个人博客 - 学习笔记

item.title: Go Cross Compile
item.description: linux set GOOS=linux set GOARCH=amd64 go build -o build/hugo main.go windows set GOOS=windows set GOARCH=amd64 go build -o build/hugo.exe main.go PS：环境变量参数参考： GOARCH: amd64, 386, arm, ppc64, … GOOS: linux, darwin, windows, netbsd, …
